text: Jilani: “Nawaga achatati wenu, wanache wenu, achachimwene wenu, achiwammakwenu, achanasi wenu, kwisa soni ipanje yanyyipatile, ni malonda gankugajogopela konasika, kwisa soni majumba gankuganonyela, (naiwaga yalakweyi) yakunonyeledwa nnope kukwenu kumpunda Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ ni kumenyana ngondo petala Lyakwe; basi jembecheyani kwikanila Allah ayiche ni chilamusi Chakwe (cha ipotesi), soni Allah ngaakwajongolaga wandu wakunyosya.”
